mapper.select: SELECT pen_id, pen_name, pen_addr2,pen_status, TO_CHAR(pen_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') pen_date FROM pension where not pen_status= 'O' order by pen_status,pen_addr2 asc
SELECT count(*) totalCount from pension where not pen_status= 'O' order by pen_status desc

SELECT p.pen_name as pen_name, p.pen_addr2 as pen_addr2 , TO_CHAR(pen_shot,'YYYY-MM-DD') as pen_shot , TO_CHAR(pen_ehot,'YYYY-MM-DD') as pen_ehot, p.pen_opt as pen_otp, p.pen_intro as pen_intro, p.pen_noti as pen_noti, o.own_id as own_id ,o.own_name as own_name ,o.own_mail as own_mail ,o.own_tel as own_tel ,o.own_bank as own_bank ,o.own_acc as own_acc, r.rom_name as rom_name ,r.rom_type as rom_type ,r.rom_people as rom_people ,r.rom_intro as rom_intro ,r.rom_cost as rom_cost,r.rom_opt as rom_opt FROM pension p, owner o, room r WHERE p.own_id=o.own_id and p.pen_id=r.pen_id and p.pen_id=#{value}
select count(pen_status) as pen_day from pension where to_char(pen_date,'DD') = to_char(sysdate,'DD')
select count(pen_status) as pen_month from pension where to_char(pen_date,'MM') = to_char(sysdate,'MM') and not pen_status= 'O'
select count(pen_status) as pen_ok from pension where pen_status = 'Y'
